name: soul-dew
effect: Held by Latias or Latios: Increases the holder’s Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.
short_effect: Raises Latias and Latios’s Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Hold item: Raises SP. ATK & SP. DEF of LATIOS & LATIAS.
flavor_text.emerald: Hold item: raises SP. ATK & SP. DEF of LATIOS & LATIAS.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An orb to be held by a LATIOS or LATIAS. It raises the SP. ATK and SP. DEF stats.
